title: Align Pack v1
description: Schema for AlignTrue Align packs (Spec v1, CLI-first)

id.description: Pack identifier. Solo mode: simple names (e.g., 'my-rules'). Team mode: project-scoped (e.g., 'mycompany/backend'). Catalog mode: pack namespacing (e.g., 'packs/mycompany/backend').

source_format.description: Source format of the align document. Optional metadata field for tracking authoring method.

summary.description: One-line description. Optional in solo mode, required in team/catalog modes.

owner.description: Owner identifier (e.g., 'mycompany/platform' or 'john-smith'). Required in team/catalog modes.

source.description: Source repository URL or identifier (e.g., 'github.com/mycompany/rules'). Required in team/catalog modes.

source_sha.description: Git commit SHA or content hash for reproducibility. Required in team/catalog modes.

tags.description: Categorization tags (catalog mode - removed from roadmap)

deps.description: Pack dependencies with optional version constraints (catalog mode - removed from roadmap)

scope.description: Scope definition (catalog mode - removed from roadmap)

sections.description: Content sections with natural markdown headings and content

value.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash. Optional in solo mode, required in catalog mode.

original_structure.description: Markdown structure used in source document

header_prefix.description: Header text before natural markdown sections (e.g., '# AlignTrue Rules')

guidance_position.description: Where document guidance was located in markdown

_markdown_meta.description: Metadata for byte-identical markdown round-trip reconstruction (excluded from canonical hash)

slots.description: Slot declarations (base packs declare configurable values)

fills.description: Fill values (stack packs and repos provide concrete values)

plugs.description: Plugs v1.1: Stack-agnostic rule authoring with configurable slots and fills

content.description: Natural language content in markdown format

fingerprint.description: Stable content-based identifier for change tracking

explicitId.description: Optional user-provided ID via HTML comment

description.description: One short sentence explaining what this plug is for

format.description: Format validation type: command (no env vars except CI), text (any UTF-8), file (repo-relative), url (http/https)

required.description: Whether this slot must be filled
